verses.verse: <S%H518>"If<s%> you do not <S%H8085>listen,<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you do not <S%H7760>take<s%> it to <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H9202>honor<s%> to My <S%H8034>name,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> "then I will <S%H7971>send<s%> the <S%H3994>curse<s%> upon you, and I will <S%H779>curse<s%> your <S%H1293>blessings;<s%> and <S%H1571>indeed,<s%> I have <S%H779>cursed<s%> them [already], <S%H3588>because<s%> you are not <S%H7760>taking<s%> [it] to <S%H3820>heart.<s%>

<S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> I am going to <S%H1605>rebuke<s%> your <S%H2233>offspring,<s%> and I will <S%H2219>spread<s%> <S%H6569>refuse<s%> on your <S%H6440>faces,<s%> the <S%H6569>refuse<s%> of your <S%H2282>feasts;<s%> and you will be <S%H5375>taken<s%> away with it.

"Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I have <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4687>commandment<s%> to you, that My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> may <S%H1961>continue<s%> with <S%H3878>Levi,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"My <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with him was [one of] <S%H9132>life<s%> and <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and I <S%H5414>gave<s%> them to him [as an object of] <S%H4172>reverence;<s%> so he <S%H3372>revered<s%> Me, and <S%H2865>stood<s%> in <S%H2865>awe<s%> of My <S%H8034>name.<s%>

<S%H571>"True<s%> <S%H8451>instruction<s%> was in his <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H9390>unrighteousness<s%> was not <S%H4672>found<s%> on his <S%H8193>lips;<s%> he <S%H1980>walked<s%> with Me in <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H4334>uprightness,<s%> and he <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> from <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

"For the <S%H8193>lips<s%> of a <S%H3548>priest<s%> should <S%H8104>preserve<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and men should <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H8451>instruction<s%> from his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> for he is the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"But as for you, you have <S%H5493>turned<s%> <S%H5493>aside<s%> from the <S%H1870>way;<s%> you have caused <S%H7227>many<s%> to <S%H3782>stumble<s%> by the <S%H8451>instruction;<s%> you have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"So I <S%H1571>also<s%> have <S%H5414>made<s%> you <S%H959>despised<s%> and <S%H8217>abased<s%> before <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H6310>just<s%> <S%H834><s%> as you are not <S%H8104>keeping<s%> My <S%H1870>ways,<s%> but are <S%H5375>showing<s%> <S%H5375>partiality<s%> <S%H6440><s%> in the <S%H8451>instruction.<s%>

"Do we not <S%H3605>all<s%> have <S%H259>one<s%> father? Has not <S%H1>one<s%> <S%H259>God<s%> <S%H410>created<s%> us? <S%H1254>Why<s%> do we <S%H4069>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> <S%H898>each<s%> against his <S%H376>brother<s%> so as to <S%H251>profane<s%> the <S%H2490>covenant<s%> of our fathers?

<S%H3063>"Judah<s%> has <S%H898>dealt<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> has been <S%H6213>committed<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> for <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H2490>profaned<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He <S%H157>loves,<s%> and has <S%H1166>married<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of a <S%H5236>foreign<s%> <S%H410>god.<s%>

"[As] for the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> this, may the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> [everyone] who <S%H5782>awakes<s%> and <S%H6030>answers,<s%> or who <S%H5066>presents<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

"And <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H8145>another<s%> <S%H8145>thing<s%> you <S%H6213>do:<s%> you <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H1832>tears,<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping<s%> and with <S%H603>groaning,<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> He <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H6437>regards<s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> or <S%H3947>accepts<s%> [it with] <S%H7522>favor<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'For <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H5921>reason<s%> <S%H4100><s%>?' <S%H5921>Because<s%> <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has been a <S%H5749>witness<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> you and the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> against <S%H834>whom<s%> you have <S%H898>dealt<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> though she is your <S%H2278>companion<s%> and your <S%H802>wife<s%> by <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

"But not <S%H259>one<s%> has <S%H6213>done<s%> [so] who has a <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of the <S%H7307>Spirit.<s%> And <S%H4100>what<s%> did [that] <S%H259>one<s%> [do] while he was <S%H1245>seeking<s%> a <S%H430>godly<s%> <S%H2233>offspring<s%>? <S%H8104>Take<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> then, to your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and let <S%H408>no<s%> one <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously<s%> against the <S%H802>wife<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth.<s%>

"For I <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H7971>divorce,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "and him who <S%H3680>covers<s%> his <S%H3830>garment<s%> with <S%H2555>wrong,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%> "So <S%H8104>take<s%> <S%H8104>heed<s%> to your <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> that you do not <S%H898>deal<s%> <S%H898>treacherously.<s%>"

You have <S%H3021>wearied<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with your <S%H1697>words.<s%> Yet you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>"How<s%> have we <S%H3021>wearied<s%> [Him]?" In that you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3605>"Everyone<s%> who <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He <S%H2654>delights<s%> in them," <S%H176>or,<s%> <S%H346>"Where<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H4941>justice<s%>?"
